name: Sonic The Hedgehog Full Trilogy
description:
This is a project that I start to see what you can do with 25 year old software.

This game was made by a 12 year old, and was made using the game engine clickteam fusion 2.5/Multimedia Fusion 2.5

The Mod is Not So Simple Sonic Worlds

Controls

Up,Down,Left,Right Arows to move

Z to jump

X,C and A is SonicEX moves (Can only be used in last stage)

S to skip any level if buggy or you just want you progress back

M to change music to midi

R to change back to PCM music or to reset it.

G to change to 12 voice FM music

F2 to reset entire game

Enter for start or to Access Pause menu (Continue resets the level the you were on),(Restart bring you back to character select),(Quit stops the game).

Midi is using your native Roland or Casio midi emulator to play music and is not just a convertion of midi to MP3 sample.

12 Voice FM is emulated by using your PC speaker (Commonly found on laptops or old desktops) or if don't have a PC speaker then it will just use samples.
